channel.title: CVE Feed for umbraco -- Umbraco.Workflow.Issues
channel.description: The latest CVEs for umbraco -- Umbraco.Workflow.Issues

item.title: CVE-2024-32872|2024-07-03T18:23:57.789Z -- umbraco -- umbraco.workflow.issues
item.description: Umbraco workflow provides workflows for the Umbraco content management system. Prior to versions 10.3.9, 12.2.6, and 13.0.6, an Umbraco Backoffice user can modify requests to a particular API endpoint to include SQL, which will be executed by the server. Umbraco Workflow versions 10.3.9, 12.2.6, 13.0.6, as well as Umbraco Plumber version 10.1.2, contain a patch for this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-32872|2024-04-24T14:46:28.239Z -- umbraco -- umbraco.workflow.issues
